  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/987</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/987</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La familia de Pascual Duarte</string>
            <string language="en">"The Family of Pascual Duarte"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"die Familie von Pascual Duarte"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"la famille de Pascual Duarte"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"a família de Pascual Duarte"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"la famiglia di Pascual Duarte"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Η οικογένεια του Pascual Duarte"</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Document de treball sobre l'obra de Camilo J. Cela. Té quatre seccions: aproximacions crítiques a l'obra, de Sobejano i Marañón; textos de l'autor sobre l'obra; context espaial i temporal, i una fitxa per comparar la novel·la amb la versió cinematogràfica de Ricardo Franco.</string>
            <string language="en">Worksheet on the novel by Camilo J. Cela in four sections: critical appreciations by Sobejano and Marañón, author's remarks on the novel, the time and place of the story, and a comparison between the novel and the film by Ricardo Franco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història contemporània</string>
            <string language="en">contemporary history</string>
            <string language="es">historia contemporánea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">novel·la</string>
            <string language="en">novel</string>
            <string language="es">novela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">psicologia</string>
            <string language="en">psychology</string>
            <string language="es">psicología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen auf dem Roman durch Camilo J. Cela in vier 
Kapiteln: kritische Anerkennungen durch Sobejano und Marañón, 
Anmerkungen des Autors auf dem Roman, die Zeit und der Ort der 
Geschichte und ein Vergleich zwischen dem Roman und dem Film durch 
Ricardo Franco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau sur le roman par Camilo J. Cela dans 
quatre sections : appréciations critiques par Sobejano et 
Marañón, remarques de l'auteur sur le roman, la période et 
l'endroit de l'histoire, et une comparaison entre le roman et le film 
par Ricardo Franco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha na novela por Camilo J. Cela em quatro 
seções: apreciações críticas por Sobejano e Marañón, 
observações do autor na novela, a época e o lugar da história, e 
uma comparação entre a novela e a película por Ricardo Franco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro sul romanzo da Camilo J. Cela in
quattro sezioni: apprezzamenti critici da Sobejano e Marañón, 
osservazioni dell'autore sul romanzo, la data e la località della 
storia e un confronto fra il romanzo e la pellicola da Ricardo Franco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας στο μυθιστόρημα από τον Camilo J.
Cela σε τέσσερα τμήματα: κρίσιμες εκτιμήσεις από 
Sobejano και maraρσn, παρατηρήσεις του συντάκτη στο 
μυθιστόρημα, το χρόνο και τόπο της ιστορίας, και μια σύγκριση 
μεταξύ του μυθιστορήματος και της ταινίας από το Ricardo 
Franco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zeitgenössische Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Roman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Psychologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire contemporaine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">roman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">psychologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">novela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">psychology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia contemporanea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">romanzo</string>
